snippet: “World News With Diane Sawyer” eked out a 12,000-viewer lead among viewers advertisers most value — the first such ratings victory since last July.
abstract: ABC News scores rare victory over NBC News as its evening news show, World News With Diane Sawyer, beats NBC's Nightly News with 12,000-viewer lead among viewers between ages of 25 and 54, group most valued by advertisers.
lead_paragraph: “World News With Diane Sawyer” eked out a 12,000-viewer lead among viewers advertisers most value — the first such ratings victory since last July.

headline.main: ABC’s Nightly News Scores a Rare Ratings Win Over NBC’s
headline.print_headline: ABC’s Evening News Scores Rare Ratings Win Over NBC’s
